On Dec 19, 2007 1:30 PM, Colin Green <locster01@...> wrote:
>  Also, GUI development in Java is a horrendous
> ordeal
>  > compared to VS and the resulting front end has a tendency to look like an
> OS/2
>  > program.

Eh, it's not the most beautiful front-end in the world, but you can do
some pretty slick-looking stuff. I'm currently implementing my
cortical modeling algorithm in Java, and the resulting networks are
3D, so I'm using Java3D for visualization of the networks, and I'm
quite happy with it. When it's in better shape I'll post some screen
shots.

--Derek
